segments.text: This indoor kitchen scene catches my attention immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is there, focused on polishing a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is blank; she doesn't see the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushes from the faucet, flooding the basin and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, and her shoe is soaked already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect and undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back, letting in that natural light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stool is my main concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, grabbing from the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling; it's not safe at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up too, part of the sneaky plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're ignoring all the dangers around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes wait patiently on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets show the jar labeled clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a recipe for disaster this whole setup is.
segments.speaker: PAR
